doctype.name: mimeRegistry
doctype.internal: <!ELEMENT mimeRegistry (directory+)> <!ELEMENT directory (type*)> <!ATTLIST directory name CDATA #REQUIRED > <!ELEMENT type EMPTY> <!ATTLIST type id ID #REQUIRED name CDATA #REQUIRED parentTypes IDREFS #IMPLIED aliasTypes IDREFS #IMPLIED namePatterns CDATA #IMPLIED definition CDATA #IMPLIED >

result.doctype: <!DOCTYPE mimeRegistry [ <!ELEMENT mimeRegistry (directory+)> <!ELEMENT directory (type*)> <!ATTLIST directory name CDATA #REQUIRED > <!ELEMENT type EMPTY> <!ATTLIST type id ID #REQUIRED name CDATA #REQUIRED parentTypes IDREFS #IMPLIED aliasTypes IDREFS #IMPLIED namePatterns CDATA #IMPLIED definition CDATA #IMPLIED > ]>
